TestDescriptor.Name: Complex type handling (java class) with direct acces to the field with introspection
TestDescriptor.Author: Sebastien Gignoux
TestDescriptor.Comment:
The goal of this test is to test the handling of complex type by the introspector. The fields will be accessed directly (they should be public). The test involve self-referencing object:
- direct self reference: an object of type A contain a reference to an object of type A
- indirect self reference: an object of type A contain a reference to an object of type B wich contain a reference to an object of type A
